thread.title: Freddy Adu fails to land a contract with MLS side Portland Timbers after trial as career takes nosedive
thread.title_full: Freddy Adu fails to land a contract with MLS side Portland Timbers after trial as career takes nosedive

author: jgordon
title: Freddy Adu fails to land a contract with MLS side Portland Timbers after trial as career takes nosedive
text:
EFL MUCH ADU ABOUT NOTHING Freddy Adu fails to land a contract with MLS side Portland Timbers after trial as career takes nosedive 
Former child prodigy - now 27 - is a free agent after his deal with the Tampa Bay Rowdies ran out By JAMIE GORDON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments FREDDY ADU failed to land a contract after a trial with the Portland Timbers to continue a remarkable fall from grace. 
The former child prodigy – now 27 – is a free agent after his contract with the Tamba Bay Rowdies ran out. Getty Images 6 Freddy Adu hit international headlines after signing for DC United as a 14-year-old 
And following two pre-season friendly appearances with the Timbers, the MLS outfit confirmed Adu had not done enough. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest MLS news, gossip and rumours 
Coach Caleb Porter told Oregonlive : “Freddy is no longer with us 
“He had two weeks and we were up front and honest with him about where we’re at. 
“More than anything, you look at the depth, there’s just not going to be a spot.” Related Stories CHILD'S PLAY Seven wonderkids who made their debuts before turning 16... after Galatasaray blood 14-year-old starlet Mustafa Kapi 'Lacks so much class' New York Red Bulls try to troll retired Frank Lampard on Twitter and get brutally blasted by fans Guoan my son Wayne Rooney subject of cheeky '£20million offer by Beijing Sinobo Guoan'... but he prefers move to MLS 'I'd have been a ball boy' Sebastian Giovinco reveals why he rejected Barcelona switch.. and why he could move to China GU-GONE FOR GOOD Goalkeeper Brad Guzan to leave Middlesbrough and return to the MLS in the summer JON'S BRUM CAREER IS ORL OVER Birmingham's US star Jonathan Spector is close to move to the MLS with Orlando Real deal Liverpool's young American striker Brooks Lennon is a loan target for MLS side Real Salt Lake 
Adu caught the eye of clubs all over the world after signing a pro deal with DC United aged just 14. 
He was linked with Chelsea and Manchester United among others and was pictured in Red Devils gear. 
But despite huge promise, the American never lived up to the hype and has played for a total of 13 clubs in a journeyman career. Wonderkid compared to Pele is now Twitter vacuum cleaner salesman Getty Images Adu was once labelled as the new Pele but fell by the wayside Getty Images The Ghana-born attacking midfielder was given a chance by Portuguese giants Benfica but did not establish himself AP:Associated Press 6 Adu was linked with Manchester United in 2006 but a move never materialised 
These include Portuguese giants Benfica , who gave the attacking midfielder a chance in 2007 and Monaco who took him on loan in 2008. 
Ghana-born Adu returned to the States in 2011 with Philadelphia Union before spells at Brazilian outfit Bahia, Jagodina in Serbia and Finish Premier League side KuPS. Reuters Adu won 17 international caps but has not represented his country since 2011 Getty Images 6 Attacking midfielder has played for 13 clubs during three spells in the USA as well as time in Europe and South America 
The Rowdies brought him back fro a third spell in America in 2015 but the move ended in another failure to take root. 
Adu has won 17 international caps, with the last coming in 2011.
